content: SPX Fine Finish diamond cup wheel Ultimate diamond cup wheel for for angle grinders – for finishing grinding concrete and natural stone ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- - - ### FEATURES:Features Creates a smooth surface finish thanks to the fine abrasive diamond mixture Gentle material removal Advanced cooling – patented cooling pins help to prevent damage to the cup wheel segments due to overheating Robust – these cup wheels are built from the highest-grade materials using durable contact welding Minimized vibration – every cup wheel is individually checked and balanced before leaving the plant Applications Finishing grinding on concrete and natural stone Surface preparation ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Cordless angle grinder, Corded angle grinder, Concrete grinder DGH 130 Base material: Concrete, Natural stone Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Tool type | Cordless angle grinder, Corded angle grinder, Concrete grinder DGH 130 | Base material | Concrete, Natural stone | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2238555 - Diamond cup wheel 5 SPX fine finish - Package Size 1 pc
